        map of field name to Field.

      • getSchema

        public static org.apache.avro.Schema getSchema(Class<? extends PersistentBase> clazz)
                                        throws SecurityException,
                                               NoSuchFieldException,
                                               IllegalArgumentException,
                                               IllegalAccessException
        Returns the schema of the class.
        Parameters:
        clazz - Class instance of the persistent bean.
        Returns:
        the schema of persistent bean instance.
        Throws:
        SecurityException - if the caller's class loader is not the same as the class loader of above class.
        NoSuchFieldException - if a field with the specified name is not found.
        IllegalArgumentException - this will not be thrown since field.get(obj) passing obj is ignored since the SCHEMA field is a static class level variable inside the persistent bean class.
        IllegalAccessException - if the field is inaccessible due to java language access control.

      • getPersistentFieldNames

        public static String[] getPersistentFieldNames(PersistentBase persistent)
        Return the field names from a persistent object.
        Parameters:

        Returns:
        the field names String array.

      • deepClonePersistent

        public static <T extends PersistentBase> T deepClonePersistent(T persistent)
        Utility method for deep clone a given AVRO persistent bean instance.
        Type Parameters:
        T - persistent bean type.
        Parameters:
        persistent - source persistent bean instance.
        Returns:
        cloned persistent bean to be returned.
